          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kateri val je vsota?</string>
            <string language="en">Which wave is the sum?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welche Welle ist die Summe?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle vague est la somme ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que onda é a soma?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quale onda è la somma?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιο κύμα είναι το ποσό;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué onda es la suma?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">3D seštevanje dveh EM valov in skupni val.</string>
            <string language="en">Superposition of two EM waves and the resulting wave in 3D.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">skupni val</string>
            <string language="en">net wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">polarizacija</string>
            <string language="en">polarization</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Superposition von zwei EM Wellen und das Resultieren 
bewegen in 3D wellenartig.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La superposition de deux vagues de fin de support et 
résulter ondulent dans 3D.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O superposition de duas ondas do EM e resultar acenam em 
3D.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un superposition di due onde di EM e risultare fluttuano 
in 3D.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Superposition δύο κυμάτων EM και το προκύπτον 
κύμα σε τρισδιάστατο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La superposición de dos ondas del EM y el resultar agitan
en 3D.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nettowelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
